snippet: Two senior envoys of the Dalai Lama who negotiated with China in nine rounds of talks have resigned, according to the Tibetan government-in-exile in India.
abstract: Tibetan government-in-exile in India announces that two senior envoys of the Dalai Lama who negotiated with China in nine rounds of talks have resigned; the envoys attribute their resignations to the deteriorating situation in Tibet.
lead_paragraph: Two senior envoys of the Dalai Lama who negotiated with China in nine rounds of talks have resigned, according to the Tibetan government-in-exile in India.
